amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds available to the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection to enforce or administer any guidance with respect to indirect auto lending.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 32 printed in House Report 114-639 to make no funds available to the CFPB to enforce or administer guidance pertaining to indirect auto lending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Guinta amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 162, 1 Present (Roll no. 383).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Guinta amendment (A026) Agreed to by recorded vote: 260 - 162, 1 Present (Roll no. 383).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A026) offered by Mr. Guinta.
